body_html:
As per the guide, please use the URL for Python 2.7 and not 3.4: https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl

Alternatively, just use pip install tensorflow
body_text:
As per the guide, please use the URL for Python 2.7 and not 3.4: https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
Alternatively, just use pip install tensorflow
body:
As per [the guide](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_linux#python_27), please use the URL for Python 2.7 and not 3.4: https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-1.0.1-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl

Alternatively, just use `pip install tensorflow`
